Title: Seapeak Bahrain tanker signals arrival at Fujairah ahead of startup as Bahrain’s FSU
Description: The 174,000 m3 Seapeak Bahrain LNG tanker has started to signal an arrival at the UAE’s Fujairah port, nearly six months after idling offshore Malaysia and ahead of its start-up as a floating storage unit (FSU) at Bahrain’s LNG terminal.
Author: JS

Title: Delfin Midstream to supply Sefe with 1.5 mtpa of LNG for 15 years
Description: US-based LNG project developer Delfin Midstream has signed a head of agreement with Germany’s Sefe to supply it with 1.5 mtpa of LNG for at least 15 years, sourced from the proposed 13.2 mtpa Delfin FLNG export project offshore Louisiana.
Author: JS

Title: Freeport LNG ships cargo after unplanned outage; emissions reports signal possible restart
Description: The 15 mtpa Freeport LNG plant on Quintana Island, Texas, has shipped an LNG cargo after an unplanned shutdown yesterday due to interrupted feed gas supplies, with emissions reports indicating that all three liquefaction trains are now back online.
Author: CK

Title: Electricity Generating Authority of Thailand seeks one May LNG cargo
Description: State-owned Electricity Generating Authority of Thailand has issued a tender to buy one LNG cargo for delivery on May 24-25 to the Map Ta Phut LNG receiving terminal in Rayong. The tender closes on Mar. 28.
Author: CK
